name: Definitions
text:
As used in this chapter, unless the context otherwise requires: 	"Absentee ballot" means a ballot as defined in section 11-1 used in absentee voting.
	"Absentee polling place" means an office or other suitable facility designated by the respective clerks for the conduct of absentee voting and the processing of absentee ballots.
	"Invalid ballot" means any absentee ballot which does not meet the requirements for a ballot to be counted as listed in section 15-9.
	"Voter in a remote area" means any registered voter who resides ten miles or more from the voter's designated polling place by the most direct route for public travel. [L 1975, c 36, pt of §3; am L 1976, c 106, §4(1); gen ch 1985]
